name: The Price of Freedom (itch)
description:
Andreas, a member of the Infernal Dragons clan, has always been one of the most reliable assassin they had. A rigged mission throws him to the jail, with no hope of freedom. Then, his clan broke him out, giving him one last job: kidnap the princess of Karystos and bring her to them. Only then, he'll be a free man.

But is this job the only price?
